thread.title: BRIEF-PRD Energy Provides Update On Liquidation & Dissolution Process

title: BRIEF-PRD Energy Provides Update On Liquidation & Dissolution Process

organizations.name: brief-prd energy provides update on liquidation & d
process reuters staff    prd energy inc

text:
April 10, 2018 / 4:38 PM / Updated 19 minutes ago BRIEF-PRD Energy Provides Update On Liquidation & Dissolution Process Reuters Staff 
April 10 (Reuters) - PRD Energy Inc: 
* PRD ENERGY PROVIDES UPDATE ON LIQUIDATION & DISSOLUTION PROCESS * CURRENTLY DISSOLVING GERMAN SUBSIDIARIES 
* EXPECTS GERMAN SUBSIDIARIES TO BE DISSOLVED BEFORE END OF Q2 OF 2018 
* IS COMPLETING ALL OTHER ACTS REQUIRED TO LIQUIDATE BUSINESS 
* EXPECTS TO COMPLETE LIQUIDATION AND DISSOLUTION AND FINAL DISTRIBUTION OF NET PROCEEDS OF LIQUIDATION IN H2 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
